sources.title: Law of the Lash
sources.description: Title: Law of the Lash Summary: U.S. marshal goes undercover to clean up a town run by bandits. Directed by: Ray Taylor Actors: Lash La Rue, Al St. John, Lee Roberts Production Company: Producers Releasing Corporation (PRC) Release Date: 28 February 1947 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When Decker's gang holds up a stage, henchman Lefty takes a lady's rings. Later lefty accidentally exposes the rings buying ammunition and Cheyenne sees them. When Lefty tries to shoot Cheyenne he is captured. Now Cheyenne wants the rest of the gang and their leader.

sources.title: Law of the Lash
sources.description: A western with Lash La Rue and Al St. John.

sources.title: Law of The Lash (1947) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Lash La Rue, Al St. John, Lee Roberts
 Director: Ray Taylor

 U.S. marshal goes undercover to clean up a town run by bandits.

metadata.Plot: When Decker's gang holds up a stage, henchman Lefty takes a lady's rings. Later lefty accidentally exposes the rings buying ammunition and Cheyenne sees them. When Lefty tries to shoot Cheyenne he is captured. Now Cheyenne wants the rest of the gang and their leader.
